description.value: This kit contains lockpicks and other tools you need to use the @Compendium[pf1.skills.CCy1fajKKU3K02iQ]{Disable Device} skill. Without these tools, you must use improvised tools, and you take a -2 circumstance penalty on @Compendium[pf1.skills.CCy1fajKKU3K02iQ]{Disable Device} checks.
